about_the_game:
[Main Story]

you and your girlfriend have had a boring relationship for years...
everything feels boring... you both can't do anything to fix the relationship...
you have already tried everything, but the results are the same...
you both made a promise that if something bad happens, a breakup is not going to be enough...
and you have already made a decision a long time ago to marry her after she finished school...
you just can't let your relationship with her just be broken...
you love her so much, and of course, she loves you too...
so you make a bold move...
you're trying so hard to fix your problem...
and the result is the same...

but something good is happening to you -- you just found a suspicious shop on the way home...
She tells you something that you've never done with your girlfriend...
and you feel there's finally some hope...

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[Key Features]

- 1280p 60fps smooth animation gameplay!
- real-time appearance changes! cosplay time! dress up your girlfriend as you desire!


[Gameplay Content]

- 11 H-scenes with each having 8-22 different animations...
- there's no endgame, just enjoy your sexy time with your girlfriend every night
- with the roleplay situation, she will treat you like a complete stranger. there's a good chance it's going to be a new experience for the both of you!
- it's a casual game, there's no need for the extra effort to unlock the locked features...
- unlock the locked features with credits you've earned, and clear the challenges to unlock new cosplay clothes also H position!

Note:
All the characters are 21 years and above old and cosplay with old, retained costumes and uniforms, especially school uniform attire
You can unlock the Scene immediately with cheat inside the game folder

content_descriptors.notes:
This game depicts explicit sex acts between an anime adult man and anime adult woman, including fellatio, irrumatio, penetrative vaginal sex in various positions, and bondage. Full anime nudity and depiction of sex organs, both internal and external, is included.

This game requires collecting coins from the mini-game to unlock the scene and buy items in the store.
All the stages must be completed to unlock all the outfits.

For the explicit sexual scenes, it is consensual sex, not forced. The game features bondage play (BDSM) as  a feature.

The game contains potions and players can use various potions such as aphrodisiacs and energy boosters. There are no negative effects from their use. They increase sensitivity and decrease stamina during the sex scenes.

This game features showing a cross-section view of the genitals.

In the sex scenes, the player can control the girl's expression and voice as desired.

Also, players can control the camera, such as having it in follow mode and performing a screen shake.

name: Cosplay Fever!!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP/Windows Vista or higher
  • Processor: Single Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Native graphics card or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10; 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Enjoy a cosplay session with an anime college girl who likes cosplaying with her school uniforms! Enjoy 11 scenes in this casual game where you can unlock new positions and outfits!
